name: places/ChIJC1ZicQBZwokRUAjGT74p5wg
formattedAddress: 114 Suffolk St, New York, NY 10002, USA
adrFormatAddress: 114 Suffolk St, New York, NY 10002-3331, USA

originalText.text: Absolutely loved Pilates Coven! The cues, energy, music, and staff are top notch. Aside from being a safe space, the instructors are amazing and work with you at your pace. I highly recommend having a private with Sabrina no matter what level you’re at.

text.text: Absolutely loved Pilates Coven! The cues, energy, music, and staff are top notch. Aside from being a safe space, the instructors are amazing and work with you at your pace. I highly recommend having a private with Sabrina no matter what level you’re at.

originalText.text: Pilates Coven is the REAL deal! Sabrina is by far and away one of the most knowledgeable instructors in the city; she's amazing at modifying exercises when needed, gives very precise cues, and really helps to build your confidence no matter your skill level. Also all of the thought and care that's gone into creating such an inviting, inclusive space really shows. If you haven't tried a class yet, you're in for a treat! :)

text.text: Pilates Coven is the REAL deal! Sabrina is by far and away one of the most knowledgeable instructors in the city; she's amazing at modifying exercises when needed, gives very precise cues, and really helps to build your confidence no matter your skill level. Also all of the thought and care that's gone into creating such an inviting, inclusive space really shows. If you haven't tried a class yet, you're in for a treat! :)

originalText.text: If you're looking for an inclusive, non-intimidating and welcoming space to begin your pilates practice, this is it. Owner and instructor Sabrina is so dope, as are the rest of the coven's incredible instructors. Sarah's jumpboard classes are challenging in the best way. The studio offers a comfortable vibe, where the lights are often dimmed, making it easier to focus on yourself and how you connect with the movements. I always walk away from class feeling accomplished, knowing that I took the time for myself. ☺️

text.text: If you're looking for an inclusive, non-intimidating and welcoming space to begin your pilates practice, this is it. originalText.text:
I would be very honest about this place since I love Pilates. If you are a beginner, yes, go for it.  It would be a great first step. They are gentle, slow and have more comfortable (big, wide, more cushiony) machines than other places. However, I’m pretty sporty, whenever I go, I get frustrated except for one instructor that I’ve been following years from another place. (She works at multiple places). Since their location works better for me, wanted to love this one a lot, but def not for me… my avg workout heart rate is like 150-160bpm and max out up to 170bpm during Pilates… but with them, only 110 bpm haha do you see how chill I am and not fully satisfied from their instructors lol
Anyway, for beginners, I recommend here, if you are somewhat athletic, prob other places. (Unless you have your own favorite instructor there like me, I’m still going only for her class)

I would be very honest about this place since I love Pilates. If you are a beginner, yes, go for it.  It would be a great first step. They are gentle, slow and have more comfortable (big, wide, more cushiony) machines than other places. However, I’m pretty sporty, whenever I go, I get frustrated except for one instructor that I’ve been following years from another place. (She works at multiple places). Since their location works better for me, wanted to love this one a lot, but def not for me… my avg workout heart rate is like 150-160bpm and max out up to 170bpm during Pilates… but with them, only 110 bpm haha do you see how chill I am and not fully satisfied from their instructors lol
Anyway, for beginners, I recommend here, if you are somewhat athletic, prob other places. (Unless you have your own favorite instructor there like me, I’m still going only for her class)

originalText.text: When my friend dragged me to Pilates Coven almost a year ago, I literally didn't even know what Pilates was. Pilates Coven is a viiiibe. All of the instructors are amazing and super welcoming no matter your skill level. I have always felt like I belonged. Also who doesn't want to work out with the lights off and the aurora/stars projected on the ceiling?! I am so happy to have found this coven.
